name: Temporal Shore
description:
In this roguelike deck-builder, you lead a team of survivors stranded on a mysterious island. Your focus is on survival as you manage resources like food, morale, and time while facing various challenges.

You begin each game with a basic deck of cards that you can use to explore the island, scavenge for resources, and encounter events. As you progress through the game, you'll earn rewards that can be used to improve your deck and increase your chances of survival.

Event cards have a limited time to complete, and if left unaddressed, they will cause setbacks for your team. You must balance your exploration with your need to complete events, manage your resources, and overcome obstacles to survive.

One of the main goals is to reach a high enough escape progress to find a way out of the island and win the game. But with a limited amount of time, a dwindling supply of food, and morale that can quickly sour, you must carefully manage your actions and decisions to avoid failure.

The game features a unique time loop mechanic that sends your team back to the beginning if you run out of time, adding an extra layer of challenge and strategy. With each new loop, you must adapt and try new tactics to overcome the challenges that stand in your way.

Whether you're a fan of roguelike deck-builders, survival games, or just looking for a new challenge, this game offers a rich and immersive experience full of mystery and intrigue. Are you ready to face the unknown and fight for your survival?

The game was made over a 6 days period for the "All by AI" Game Jam.
The chosen theme was Limited Lifespan Island.

- The theme, setting, and mechanics were co-designed with ChatGPT.
- All card ideas, names, and descriptions were created and then balanced by ChatGPT.
- The game's name and all text both in-game and on the store page were generated by ChatGPT.
- Illustrations, backgrounds, card frames, and the logo were generated by Leonardo.AI.
- Music was generated by AIVA.
